courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems
courses.description: This program bridges business and technology, focusing on how information systems support organizational operations and decision-making.

course_units.title: Introduction to Information Systems
course_units.description: Foundations of information systems in organizations.

course_units.title: Business Fundamentals for IS
course_units.description: Basic business concepts and practices for information systems professionals.

course_units.title: Programming for Business Applications
course_units.description: Introduction to programming with business applications focus.

course_units.title: Database Management Systems
course_units.description: Design and implementation of databases for business information systems.

course_units.title: Systems Analysis and Design
course_units.description: Methodologies for analyzing business needs and designing information systems.

course_units.title: Business Data Communications
course_units.description: Fundamentals of data communications in business environments.

course_units.title: Enterprise Systems
course_units.description: Integration and management of enterprise-wide information systems.

course_units.title: Business Process Management
course_units.description: Analysis, design, and improvement of business processes.

course_units.title: IS Project Management
course_units.description: Managing information systems projects in organizational contexts.

course_units.title: Decision Support Systems
course_units.description: Information systems for supporting decision-making processes.

course_units.title: Information Security and Governance
course_units.description: Security, privacy, and governance of information systems.

course_units.title: E-Business and E-Commerce
course_units.description: Electronic business models, strategies, and technologies.

course_units.title: Business Intelligence
course_units.description: Technologies and processes for business analytics and intelligence.

course_units.title: IS Strategy and Management
course_units.description: Strategic planning and management of information systems.

course_units.title: IS Capstone Project
course_units.description: Comprehensive project applying information systems concepts.

course_units.title: Enterprise Architecture
